00019    * Constructor.
00020    */
00021    BinaryFileIArchive::BinaryFileIArchive()
00022     : istreamPtr_(0),
00023       version_(0)
00024    {}

00032    /*
00033    * Allocate a block of memory.
00034    */
00035    void BinaryFileIArchive::setStream(std::istream& out)
00036    { 
00037       istreamPtr_ = &out;
00038    }
00039 
00040    /*
00041    * Load a std::string from BinaryFileIArchive.
00042    */
00043    template <>
00044    void serialize(BinaryFileIArchive& ar, std::string& data, 
00045                   const unsigned int version)
00046    {
00047       static std::vector<char> charvec;
00048       size_t size;
00049       ar.unpack(size);
00050       if (size > charvec.capacity()) {
00051          charvec.reserve(size + 8);
00052       }
00053       ar.unpack(&charvec[0], size);
00054       data = &charvec[0];
00055    }
00056 
00057 
00058 }
00059 #endif
